headline.print_headline: Water Woes Force Big Brewers to Tighten the Tap
headline.main: Water Woes Force Big Brewers to Tighten the Tap

docs.snippet: Some of the largest brewers in the U.S. are trying to reduce their water-to-beer ratio as drought and wildfire threaten the watersheds where they draw billions of gallons every year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some of the largest brewers in the U.S. are trying to reduce their water-to-beer ratio as drought and wildfire threaten the watersheds where they draw billions of gallons every year.

headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Meets to Discuss Argentina Debt Case
headline.main: Supreme Court Meets to Discuss Argentina Debt Case

docs.snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court is meeting privately Thursday to determine how to respond to Argentina's appeal of lower court decisions ordering it to repay more than $1.3 billion in defaulted bonds....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court is meeting privately Thursday to determine how to respond to Argentina's appeal of lower court decisions ordering it to repay more than $1.3 billion in defaulted bonds.

headline.print_headline: Metro-North Railroad: Most Safety Steps Completed
headline.main: Metro-North Railroad: Most Safety Steps Completed

docs.snippet: Metro-North Railroad, the nation's second-largest commuter rail system, on Wednesday released a final report on what it has done to improve safety following a series of accidents last year and said it has completed most of its priorities....
docs.lead_paragraph: Metro-North Railroad, the nation's second-largest commuter rail system, on Wednesday released a final report on what it has done to improve safety following a series of accidents last year and said it has completed most of its priorities.

headline.print_headline: Trade Group, Franchisees Sue to Block Seattle Minimum Wage Hike
headline.main: Trade Group, Franchisees Sue to Block Seattle Minimum Wage Hike

docs.snippet: A trade group sued the city of Seattle on Wednesday, seeking to block a sharp hike in the minimum wage to $15 an hour over the next seven years on the grounds that it unfairly favors small businesses over larger employers and franchises....
docs.lead_paragraph: A trade group sued the city of Seattle on Wednesday, seeking to block a sharp hike in the minimum wage to $15 an hour over the next seven years on the grounds that it unfairly favors small businesses over larger employers and franchises.

headline.print_headline: Factbox: Tea Party Activist Brat Is Economist and Ayn Rand Fan
headline.main: Factbox: Tea Party Activist Brat Is Economist and Ayn Rand Fan

docs.snippet: David Brat, who scored a huge political upset with his primary election defeat of House of Representatives Majority Leader Eric Cantor, is a conservative Tea Party Republican and a college professor who has written about the role of religion in ec...
docs.lead_paragraph: David Brat, who scored a huge political upset with his primary election defeat of House of Representatives Majority Leader Eric Cantor, is a conservative Tea Party Republican and a college professor who has written about the role of religion in economic growth.

headline.print_headline: England Coach Lancaster Rejigs Side for Second NZ Test
headline.main: England Coach Lancaster Rejigs Side for Second NZ Test

docs.snippet: England coach Stuart Lancaster made five changes to his team for the second test against New Zealand in Dunedin on Saturday by restoring his first-choice centres pairing and bringing flyhalf Owen Farrell back into the side....
docs.lead_paragraph: England coach Stuart Lancaster made five changes to his team for the second test against New Zealand in Dunedin on Saturday by restoring his first-choice centres pairing and bringing flyhalf Owen Farrell back into the side.

headline.print_headline: Seattle, New Center of a Tech Boom
headline.main: Seattle, the New Center of a Tech Boom

docs.snippet: With a convergence of tech companies large and small, Seattle is attracting money and talent, eager to grow in the cloud and become a hub akin to Silicon Valley....
docs.abstract: With a convergence of tech companies large and small, Seattle is attracting money and talent, eager to grow in the cloud and become a hub akin to Silicon Valley.
